    • Method Detail

      • getStringOrDefault

        public static java.lang.String getStringOrDefault(org.json.JSONObject json,
                                                  java.lang.String key,
                                                  java.lang.String def)
        Given a JSONObject retrieves the value associated with the given key parameter. If the JSONObject has no such key, then the default value will be returned and the key, value pair got set into the JSONObject itself
        Parameters:
        json - The JSONObject
        key - The key to retrieve
        def - The default value to use if no such key exists
        Returns:
        The value either default or actually associated with key

      • isStringEmpty

        public static boolean isStringEmpty(java.lang.String text)
        Checks whether the passed string is null or empty
        Parameters:
        text - The String to test
        Returns:
        true if text is null or empty, false otherwise

      • closeIgnoreException

        public static void closeIgnoreException(java.io.Closeable... closeables)
        Close a list of Closeable instances ignoring every eventual Exception.
        Parameters:
        closeables - The object to close by invoking Closeable.close() method.

      • getRandomInt

        public static int getRandomInt(int digits)
        Returns a random int with the given digits length.
        Parameters:
        digits - The length in digits
        Returns:
        The random number
